summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5278 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 34, Bell and Denny's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 3rd Avenue and 4th Avenue, from Wall Street to Vine Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 61052, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
